Wagner Labor ArchiveElmer Holmes Bobst Library70 Washington Square South10th FloorNew York, NY 10012(212) 998-2630tamiment.wagner@nyu.eduThis finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace 2018-09-20T18:45:24Describing Archives: A Content Standard
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Robert Minor Photographs PHOTOS.233
0.25 Linear Feet in 1 folder.
undated Materials are in English Robert Minor (1884-1952) was a cartoonist, journalist, and prominent member of the Communist Party of the United States of America. The collection contains two photographs. One photograph depicts Antonio Lombardo, and the other appears to be Robert Minor.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Conditions Governing Use
The Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Archives has no information about copyright ownership for this collection and is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from it. Materials in this collection are expected to enter the public domain in 120 years after their date of creation.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Robert Minor Photographs; PHOTOS 233; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
The provenance of this collection is unknown. The accession number associated with this collection is 2006.016.
Scope and Content Note
The collection contains two photographs. One photograph is signed, "To Comrade 'Bob' Minor, for whom I have the highest revolutionary regard. From, Antonio Lombardo." The other photograph is not labeled, but appears to be Minor himself.
Related Archival Materials
The Robert Minor papers are held by Columbia University Libraries.
Processing Information
In 2013, the collection was rehoused and folder title was transcribed.
Historical/Biographical Note
Robert Minor (1884-1952) was a cartoonist, journalist, and prominent member of the Communist Party of the United States of America.
Cartoonists -- United States Communism -- United States. Communist Party of the United States of America Minor, Robert, 1884-1952 Masses (New York, N.Y.)
